text: Koly tsey khto viryatʹ v nashym vidkryttyam prybutym do vas, vy budete skazaty, "Salmun `alaykum (Myr budete na vas). Vash Lord ukhvalyv shcho myloserdya ye Yoho atrybut. Otzhe, budʹ khto sered vas shcho zdiysnyuye porushennya z neznannya, ta kayetʹsya z tsʹoho chasu ta reformy, todi Vin Probachaye, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
